statements: INSERT INTO SportsTeam(team_id, team_name, team_sport, city) VALUES (1, 'Team A', 'Soccer', 'New York') ON CONFLICT(team_id) DO UPDATE SET team_name = 'Team A', team_sport = 'Soccer', city = 'New York';

INSERT INTO SportsTeam(team_id, team_name, team_sport, city) VALUES (2, 'Team B', 'Basketball', 'Los Angeles') ON CONFLICT(team_id) DO UPDATE SET team_name = 'Team B', team_sport = 'Basketball', city = 'Los Angeles';

INSERT INTO SportsTeam(team_id, team_name, team_sport, city) VALUES (3, 'Team C', 'Football', 'Chicago') ON CONFLICT(team_id) DO UPDATE SET team_name = 'Team C', team_sport = 'Football', city = 'Chicago';
UPSERT INTO SportsTeam (team_id, team_name, sport_type) VALUES (1, 'Team A', 'Football') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE team_name = 'Team A', sport_type = 'Football';
UPSERT INTO SportsTeam (team_id, team_name, sport_type) VALUES (2, 'Team B', 'Basketball') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE team_name = 'Team B', sport_type = 'Basketball';
UPSERT INTO Player (player_id, player_name, team_id) VALUES (101, 'Player X', 1) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE player_name = 'Player X', team_id = 1;
UPSERT INTO teams (team_id, team_name) VALUES (1, 'Team A') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE team_name = 'Team A';
UPSERT INTO players (player_id, player_name, team_id) VALUES (1, 'Player 1', 1) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE player_name = 'Player 1', team_id = 1;

UPSERT INTO matches (match_id, match_date, team1_id, team2_id, winner_id) VALUES (1, '2023-01-01', 1, 2, 1) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE match_date = '2023-01-01', team1_id = 1, team2_id = 2, winner_id = 1;
UPSERT INTO teams (team_id, team_name, sport) VALUES (1, 'Team A', 'Football')
UPSERT INTO teams (team_id, team_name, sport) VALUES (2, 'Team B', 'Basketball')
UPSERT INTO teams (team_id, team_name, sport) VALUES (3, 'Team C', 'Soccer')
INSERT INTO team (team_id, team_name, sport) VALUES (1, 'Team A', 'Football') ON CONFLICT (team_id) DO UPDATE SET team_name = 'Team A', sport = 'Football';
INSERT INTO player (player_id, player_name, team_id, age) VALUES (1, 'Player 1', 1, 25) ON CONFLICT (player_id) DO UPDATE SET player_name = 'Player 1', team_id = 1, age = 25;
INSERT INTO match (match_id, match_date, team1_id, team2_id) VALUES (1, '2022-01-20', 1, 2) ON CONFLICT (match_id) DO UPDATE SET match_date = '2022-01-20', team1_id = 1, team2_id = 2;
